name: iterable
description: An iterable wrapper for MarkLogic Server-Side JavaScript

scripts.test: echo 'Node'; tape test/*.js && echo 'MarkLogic'; mltap test/*.sjs
scripts.test-pretty: npm run test-node && sleep 1 && npm run test-marklogic
scripts.docs:
if [ -d ../iterable_gh-pages ]; then documentation build --format html --output ../iterable_gh-pages; else echo 'You need to first create a sibling iterable_gh-pages directory to track the generated documentation
  cd ..
  git clone git@github.com:jmakeig/iterable.git iterable_gh-pages -b gh-pages' && exit 1; fi

author: Justin Makeig <jmpublic+github@makeig.com> (https://www.github.com/jmakeig)
